title: 3 ways to use photo-to-video in Gemini
description: Here’s how I’ve been using Gemini’s photo-to-video tool as a multimedia storyteller, plus some tips for making your own videos.
rawXml: <item xmlns:ns0="http://search.yahoo.com/mrss/"><title>3 ways to use photo-to-video in Gemini</title><link>https://blog.google/products/gemini/gemini-photo-to-video-tips/</link><ns0:content height="540" medium="image" url="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/P2V_Thumb.max-600x600.format-webp.webp" width="540" /><ns0:description>A collage of images including a still photo of a dinosaur skeleton, then the animated version created with the shown in Gemini's photo-to-video feature</ns0:description><description><img src="https://storage.googleapis.com/gweb-uniblog-publish-prod/images/P2V_Thumb.max-600x600.format-webp.webp">Here’s how I’ve been using Gemini’s photo-to-video tool as a multimedia storyteller, plus some tips for making your own videos.</description><pubDate>Fri, 19 Sep 2025 16:00:00 +0000</pubDate><guid>https://blog.google/products/gemini/gemini-photo-to-video-tips/</guid><category>Gemini</category><category>AI</category><og><type>article</type><title>3 ways to use photo-to-video in Gemini</title><description>Here’s how I’ve been using Gemini’s photo-to-video tool as a multimedia storyteller, plus some tips for making your own videos.</description><site_name>Google</site_name><url>https://blog.google/products/gemini/gemini-photo-to-video-tips/</url></og><author><name>Tatiana Gonzalez</name><title>Contributor</title><department>The Keyword</department><company /></author></item>
summary: The article provides three tips and tricks on how to effectively use Google Gemini's photo-to-video feature for creating multimedia content.
